item.title: Setting up the JVM HotSpot in CLion
item.description: Introduction As I’ve already found myself more than once going through the steps of building the JDK on my Ubuntu machine and getting the Hotspot’s source loaded into CLion, I ended up deciding to assemble this document to help me or others in the future, would the need eventually arise. Building the JDK should be relatively painless, and when problems arise the tools are in generally very specific about what’s wrong.
